File.AllUsersWebPart:
<WebPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2">
								<Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=14.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly>                         
								<TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName>
								<FrameType>None</FrameType>
								<ChromeType>None</ChromeType>
								<Title>Collapse / Expand</Title>
								<Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">
													<script type="text/javascript">
													function collapseGroups() {
													 $("img[src*='minus.gif']:visible").parent().click();
													}
													function expandGroups() {
													 $("img[src*='plus.gif']:visible").parent().click();
													}
													$(function() {
													 var expandAll = "<div style='float:right'><a href='#' onClick="
														+'"'+"this.href='javascript:expandGroups()'"
														+'"><img title="раскрыть все проекты" style="border:none;" alt="expand all" src="/_layouts/images/collapseplus.gif"></a></div>';
													 var collapseAll = "<div style='float:right'><a href='#' onClick="+'"'
														+"this.href='javascript:collapseGroups()'"
														+'"><img title="свернуть все проекты" style="border:none;" alt="collapse all" src="/_layouts/images/collapseminus.gif"></a></div>'; 

													$("#WebPartTitleWPQ7").wrapInner("<div id='projectWPTitle' style='float: left;'></div>");
													$("#WebPartTitleWPQ7").append(expandAll).append(collapseAll);
													
													_spBodyOnLoadFunctionNames.push("expandGroups"); 
													});
													</script>​​                          ​
								 </Content>
							</WebPart>
